breathing_background_image_01.paragraph_01: We implement innovative design projects using proprietary furniture solutions that transform properties purchased from the primary market into timeless interiors.
breathing_background_image_01.paragraph_02: Developer Interiors is one of the brands of a dynamically growing startup in the real estate market, which includes: our own Alternative Investment Fund ASI Developer (PLZASI00388).

offer_katowice_1.paragraph_01: The highest situated apartment with a comfortable loggia for those who value uniqueness.

offer_katowice_2.paragraph_01: An apartment designed for those who want to enjoy the potential of Katowice on their own terms.

offer_katowice_3.paragraph_01: Your small home on the XIV floor, with a spacious living room with kitchen, office, bedroom, laundry room, walk-in closet, and a large storage room on the floor.
offer_katowice_3.paragraph_02: Your oasis of peace in the heart of the city

offer_katowice_4.paragraph_01: A modern apartment for those who want everything within reach.

company_properties_01.text_01: Ready to move in, with a warranty on finishing works
company_properties_01.text_02: Selected corner units on the top floors
company_properties_01.text_03: Purchase on VAT invoice from a professional (with liability insurance)

info_01.paragraph: We offer our clients ready-to-move-in premium apartments in the heart of Katowice, featuring timeless and universal design combined with the latest technologies.

info_02.paragraph: The vision of Developer Interiors involves replicating highly refined design elements across a series of similar apartments, which helps maintain price competitiveness.

info_03.paragraph: The warranty covers all finishing works carried out by a professional construction team, as well as furniture installation, lacquered surfaces, iFrame software, and electrical installation for car charging stations.

FAQ.question: WHAT IS INCLUDED IN THE PRICE?
FAQ.answer: The buyer acquires a property free from encumbrances based on a VAT invoice, including a storage room, a share in common areas (such as the SPA area, gym, reception, and patio), and a warranty for all construction, carpentry, and finishing services carried out during the design process.

FAQ.question: MUST THE TRANSACTION BE IN EURO?
FAQ.answer: No, the sale price can be denominated in PLN.

FAQ.question: IS IT POSSIBLE TO CHARGE AN ELECTRIC CAR?
FAQ.answer: The buyer can purchase an apartment with a parking space in the garage on level 0, equipped with a full-fledged electric car charging station with a power of 22kW.

FAQ.question: WHAT ARE THE FINANCING OPTIONS?
FAQ.answer: The buyer receives an appraisal report for securing a mortgage, allowing for financing the purchase of both the property and its furnishings through a mortgage loan.

text_plus_single_video_01.header_bottom: IN THE HEART OF THE CITY

info.paragraph: The decision to purchase real estate is one of the most important financial decisions of your life. Rely on the quality provided by a professional investor _ make your purchase based on a VAT invoice, with a full warranty on design work.
A premium apartment requires premium service, provided from start to finish by your assigned transaction advisor, who will handle all the formalities.
If you own another property, it can serve as your down payment for a mortgage. Don't let financial barriers stand in the way of investing in prestige.

icons.text: Wardrobe, laundry room, storage on the same floor

texts: This ready-to-move-in apartment combines modernity with timeless elegance, from carefully selected finishing materials and meticulously chosen details to a range of technological innovations that follow the latest residential building trends.

rzut_mieszkania_01.header_bottom: on the 14th floor of Sokolska Towers
texts: Designed with functionality in mind, this apartment offers a wealth of storage space subtly integrated into the furniture layout, complemented by a wardrobe, laundry room, and spacious storage unit right across from the entrance.

info.paragraph: Our legal team will handle all formalities and secure the transaction.
We will organize the entire purchasing process for you and send the necessary documents.
We assist in obtaining financing for the purchase, even without a down payment.

texts: With each client's individual situation in mind, we have prepared a range of solutions that enable optimal financing of your purchase, even if you don't currently have all the necessary funds or down payment.
Thanks to a flexible payment model, you can reserve an apartment today by paying only 10% of its value, with the remaining amount to be paid, for example, after selling your current property.

Daily commutes can consume up to 480 hours annually. In September 2024, a rail project will begin that will permanently change the region's transportation map. The next six years will redefine the challenges of north-south travel.

You can reclaim that time by living in the heart of the city, close to main regional transport routes, business centers, health facilities, cultural and shopping hubs. From this location, you can set off wherever you want with ease. A short walk puts you within reach of everything the city center has to offer.

info.paragraph: The decision to purchase real estate is one of the most important financial decisions of your life. Choose quality from a professional investor – purchase based on a VAT invoice with a full warranty on interior work.
A premium apartment requires premium service, handled from start to finish by your dedicated transaction manager, who will take care of the formalities for you.
If you own another property, it can serve as your down payment for a mortgage. Don’t let financial barriers stand in the way of investing in prestige.
